context: Large real estate investment firm (300 employees) managing $5B portfolio seeking operational efficiency

request.purpose: Implement integrated proptech platform across portfolio
request.justification: Fragmented systems causing inefficiencies and poor tenant experience

decision_process.outcome: Identified 15 different systems across 200 properties with 60% overlap
Selected unified platform with strong IoT integration and mobile tenant apps
Comprehensive change management plan with phased rollout approach
3-year payback period with 25% operational cost reduction

expected_benefits: Improved portfolio valuation through data-driven insights
